name: Wireless Earbuds
description: Compact, high-quality earbuds with noise cancellation and a long-lasting battery.

name: Smart Watch
description: Feature-rich smart watch with heart rate monitoring, GPS, and water resistance.

name: Gaming Laptop
description: High-performance laptop with a powerful GPU, 16GB RAM, and 1TB SSD for gaming enthusiasts.

name: Leather Wallet
description: Stylish and durable wallet made from genuine leather with multiple card slots.

name: Running Shoes
description: Lightweight and breathable running shoes designed for comfort and durability.

name: Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with deep bass, 10-hour battery life, and waterproof design.

name: Coffee Maker
description: Compact coffee maker with programmable settings and a reusable filter.

name: Office Chair
description: Ergonomic office chair with lumbar support, adjustable height, and a mesh back.

name: Smartphone Case
description: Shockproof case with a slim design, available for multiple phone models.

name: Backpack
description: Multi-purpose backpack with padded laptop compartment and water-resistant material.
